description:
A TeX Editor for Vietnamese (Chương trình soạn thảo TeX)
### Features

* VieTeX Editor was based on Scintilla edit control (v2.1). 
* Allows syntax highlighting for TeX.
* Works on Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, and later.
* Supports for Unicode text files, spell check English and Vietnamese.
* Supports usual editing functions, inner keystroke macros for TeX files, Autocomplete, Folding, Coloring, Abbreviation, Script text, ...
* Includes several Vietnamese Templates and Guides.

### Parameters

* `/InstallDir:(path)` - Set custom path for the installation directory. The default setting is `C:\vietex`.

### Note

The default settings in VieTeX work best with [MikTeX](https://miktex.org/).
author: Nguyen Huu Dien
